mainText:
I am very grateful for Steve Jobs. working at the Apple Store at 
Woodfield Mall in Schaumburg, IL I learned my strengths and weakness. 
Steve built a company that gave back in so many ways. Every product is 
an investment in each customers passion. Every employee knows that they 
are enriching lives with a culture that promotes individualism, 
creativity, and allows everyone to live in a technological world without 
the need for a degree in engineering. I will never lose what Apple gave 
me; a deeper understanding of myself and the self-confidence to aim 
high. Steve will be remembered fondly.
author: Samuel
